Initial commit: Poqemon QoE Dataset analysis project

Add complete project structure including:
- Data analysis notebooks for Pokemon video QoE dataset
- Machine learning models for MOS prediction
- Visualization utilities and analysis results

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
docs: Update .gitignore and README with Korean description

Changes:
- Add .claude/settings.local.json to .gitignore to exclude local settings
- Add Korean project description at top of README
- Update repository URL from placeholder to actual GitHub URL

This ensures local configuration files are not tracked and provides
clear project description for Korean-speaking contributors.

ðŸ¤– Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
